message: Is there anyone at the conference from London? I'd like to ask a favour from someone who is travelling back this week.
I made a map of the attendees from http://lanyrd.com/2011/djangocon-europe/: http://mobilenuggets.com/djangocon/ -- seems there are a couple of people from the London area
this map is awesome, thank you!
@brutasse nice map! It seems I'm only one from Poland....
